Platyscelio pulchricornis is very widely distributed, usually in lowland tropics from India to Australia, Guam and Vanuatu, but also extending north into Nepal and Japan. In China it has been recorded in the southern part of the country only, in Guangdong and Hainan. Link to dynamic distribution map: http://hol.osu.edu/map-large.html?id=5091
